.. _`sleuth_fit`:

SLEUTH_FIT
==========

Fit a provided model to sleuth object






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_sleuth_fit:
        input:
            rds = "prep.rds"
        output:
            rds = "fit.rds"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/sleuth/fit"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

You can call this wrapper multiple times on the same sleuth object in order
to fit multiple models (eg. full, reduced, ...), and then run sleuth_lrt.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
